title: Hlimna ni ropui chu a eng
lyrics:
Hlimna ni ropui chu a eng,
Zantiang hi kawlrawnah a liam;
Lei Bethlehem dai reh a nghak,
A hming chu Lal Imanuel.

Chungnung ber, a chungnung,
Chungnung ber Lal ropui;
Leiah hian kumkhuain,
Rem leng se, Haleluia!

A hmel enin a tlawm na a,
Van leh khawvel Lalber a ni;
Leia lalin do mah sel,a
A ram a la zau zel ang a.

He! kawlkilahte lo thovin,
Tingtang leh phaiphuleng remin;
Chungnung berah ropui rawh se,
Tiin angel i zaipui ang.

A riang leh a Lal hmunah a awm,
Lei Bethlehem leh vanah khian;
Thinlung a lamah hawn ila,
Ro thil dang a ngai tawh lo vang.
